name: You Are The Best
description:
Simple Story to play through for Games Plus Jam 2021.  Not 100% certain all bugs have been squashed, but it works.

This was a collaboration between Me (CodeWarriorMalo) and two of my kids (of Feline Disposition and Scrufferz), I did the Unity/C# coding, Scrufferz did the images/drawings, and of Feline Disposition wrote the music.

Enjoy!
